To Transgress Nature's Laws Is to Transgress God's.--A continual transgression of nature's laws is a continual transgression of the law of God. Had men 

570 

always been obedient to the law of the Ten Commandments, carrying out in their lives the principles of those precepts, the curse of disease now flooding the world would not exist.--CTBH 8, 1890. (CH 20.)
